titles.title: Providing for a joint session of Congress to receive a message from the President.
Providing for a joint session of Congress to receive a message from the President.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

vote.text: Received in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

term.name: Presidents and presidential powers, Vice Presidents

bill.summary: This concurrent resolution provides for a joint session of Congress on February 4, 2020, to receive a message from the President.
